title: Ticket #3305: Either ignore dagman-node.eps or remove the rule to build it
description:
When one runs, say, make ref.dvi in doc/, git will say that doc/user-man/dagman-node.eps has been updated and needs to be committed: 
$ make ref.dvi
...
$ git status
# On branch gittrac-3303
# Your branch is ahead of 'origin/master' by 1 commit.
#
# Changes not staged for commit:
#   (use "git add <file>..." to update what will be committed)
#   (use "git checkout -- <file>..." to discard changes in working directory)
#
#       modified:   user-man/dagman-node.eps
#
$ git diff
diff --git a/doc/user-man/dagman-node.eps b/doc/user-man/dagman-node.eps
index 21b466e..7ed23bf 100644
--- a/doc/user-man/dagman-node.eps
+++ b/doc/user-man/dagman-node.eps
@@ -1,8 +1,8 @@
 %!PS-Adobe-2.0 EPSF-2.0
 %%Title: user-man/dagman-node.fig
 %%Creator: fig2dev Version 3.2 Patchlevel 5
-%%CreationDate: Mon Sep 24 15:56:24 2012
-%%For: smoler@turunmaa.cs.wisc.edu (Karen Miller)
+%%CreationDate: Mon Nov  5 08:29:58 2012
+%%For: nwp@llunet.cs.wisc.edu (Nathan Panike)
 %%BoundingBox: 0 0 228 228
 %Magnification: 0.6000
 %%EndComments
It seems like it can be built from what is already in the tree, so it should be ignored.

Alternatively, if it should not be built every time one builds the manual, the target should be removed from doc/Makefile.
check_ins: 2012-Nov-26 11:04   Check-in [34177]: do not make dagman-node.eps, as it is part of the repository ===GT=== #3305 (By Karen Miller )
creator: nwp
